sense.gloss: to say, to utter, to declare
to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping"), to make a noise
what was said, what it means, origin of a story (or tradition, etc.)
so to speak, so to call it, as it were
what is called, as it is called, the so-called, so to speak
what is called, as it is called, the so-called, known as, so to speak

k_ele.e: 過ちて改めざるこれを過ちという
過ちて改めざる是を過ちという
過ちて改めざる是を過ちと謂う

r_ele.r: あやまちてあらためざるこれをあやまちという

sense.gloss: to err and not change one's ways, this is what it is to err

sdata.j: この↑天地↑↓てんち↓の↑間↑↓ま↓にはな、↑所↑↓ところ↓↑謂↑↓いい↓↑哲学↑↓てつがく↓の↑思↑↓おも↓いも↑及↑↓およ↓ばぬ↑大事↑↓だいじ↓があるわい。
sdata.e: There are more things in Heaven and Earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy.
